snippet: In his bid to unseat Nathan Deal, Jason Carter, grandson of former President Jimmy Carter, has focused on high unemployment, underfunded schools and his opponent’s ethics.
abstract: Georgia State Senator Jason Carter, grandson of former President Jimmy Carter, has focused in his bid for the governor's seat on high unemployment, underfunded schools and ethics of opponent, Republican Gov Nathan Deal; polls show a near tie between the two candidates, and race may offer rare hope for Democrats in Deep South.
lead_paragraph: In his bid to unseat Nathan Deal, Jason Carter, grandson of former President Jimmy Carter, has focused on high unemployment, underfunded schools and his opponent’s ethics.

headline.main: Once Again, a Carter Aims to Govern in Georgia
headline.print_headline: Once Again, a Carter Aims to Govern in Georgia
